attributes.action: Guarantee Carers Rights to Assessed Direct Payments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That when a carer is assessed and approved their direct payment, that payment is guaranteed. Not to be altered by the awarding council to downgrade that assessment to fit in with council financial polices of the day.
At present, councils do not have to answer to parliment on the levels paid.
